options.content:
# Celestia Cluster monitoring dashboard

Project page: [github.com/the-node75/mon_celestia](https://github.com/the-node75/mon_celestia)

Based on influxDB + Telegarf

panels.description: Status of monitoring tool. "OK" mean you can trust other dashboard fileds
panels.title: Mon health (Consensys)

panels.description: Number of missed blocks in running 100-block window
panels.title: Missed blocks

panels.description: Number of delegated tokens to your validator.

targets.query: SELECT last("delegated")FROM "cosmonitor" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Deligated tokens

panels.description: Time interval between latest block time and server's local time. A large (>15s) value of this parameter may indicate a loss of synchronization.
panels.title: Time since latest block

panels.description: Number of connected peers to node
panels.title: Peers

targets.query: SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$inst_validator$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("usage_iowait"), 1s) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Status of bridge node monitoring tool. "OK" mean you can trust other dashboard fileds
panels.title: Bridge health

panels.description: Celestia bridge node latest block height
panels.title: Bridge height

panels.description: Celestia bridge node latest block height
panels.title: Bridge Lag

targets.query: SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$inst_bridge$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("usage_iowait"), 1s) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Status of monitoring tool. "OK" mean you can trust other dashboard fileds
panels.title: Mon health (Consensys)

panels.description: Number of connected peers to node
panels.title: Peers

targets.query: SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$inst_nodes$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("usage_iowait"), 1s) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Time interval between latest block time and server's local time. A large (>15s) value of this parameter may indicate a loss of synchronization.
panels.title: Time since latest block

targets.query: SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$inst_validator$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$inst_validator$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$inst_validator$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$inst_validator/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$inst_validator/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

list.label: Validator
list.name: inst_validator
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.label: Bridge
list.name: inst_bridge
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.label: nodes
list.name: inst_nodes
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
